alert.note: Alert for Kahoolawe; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai Leeward South; Molokai North; Molokai Southeast; Molokai West; Molokai Windward (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 09 at 3:16AM HST until January 10 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH CANCELLED FOR NIIHAU KAUAI AND OAHU... ...FLOOD WATCH CONTINUES FOR MAUI COUNTY AND BIG ISLAND... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Maui, Molokai, Lanai, Kahoolawe, and the Big Island. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A slow moving front will focus heavy showers and a few embedded thunderstorms over Maui County and the Big Island today, bringing the potential for flash flooding.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
